## Bio

I'm a postdoctoral fellow at Boston Children's Hospital/Harvard Medical School in the lab of Dr. Beth Stevens.  Broadly my research interests are focused on better understanding the immune cells of the brain, microglia, and their function and dysfunction in aging and neurodgenerative disease.  Currently, I'm utilizing single cell genomics to better characterize and understand microglia and their interactions with other brain cell populations with a focus on aging and Alzheimer's disease.
